post:
I'll keep this as simple as possible, we have a pretty awesome leap day deal, it expires at midnight, no exceptions.

**Expires**: Feb 29, 2016 11:59 PM Eastern

**Offer**:
Intel Xeon E3 1245 V2, 16 GB RAM, SSD or HDD, 10 Gbps DDoS Protection, NYC Metro or Miami, FL Data Center @ $49/m

**Order Link**: http://rsl.ink/b2QGw

**Terms**: Cannot replace existing servers, no exceptions. If you attempt to do it, the billing system will automatically remove the coupon code.
